bibl.title: The ancient manuscript tradition of the Euripidean hypotheses
bibl.seg: Massimo Magnani, The ancient manuscript tradition of the Euripidean hypotheses.

Alberto Nodar & Sofía Torallas Tovar (edd.), coedited by María Jesús Albarrán Martínez, Raquel Martín Hernández, Irene Pajón Leyra, José Domingo Rodríguez Martín & Marco Antonio Santamaría, Proceedings of the 28th Congress of Papyrology (Barcelona August 1st-6th, 2016) = Scripta Orientalia. 3 (Barcelona, 2019) pp. 135-143, fig.
